name: draw_map_for_plan
description: Draw the map of London for one (and only one) specific journey plan, wherein the trajectory of longitude and latitude line segments are drawn, each leg of a plan with different colour. By default the tool opens the webbrowser to display the map.

journey_index.description: The index of the journey which plans to retrieve

plan_index.description: The index of the plan to retrieve and display on the map

browser_display.description: Whether to display the map in the web browser or only to save it as a file; by default it is true
